long_description: Lightweight and collapsible for compact storage, the REI 3.75-Gallon Folding Water Carrier makes it easy to carry and keep water at your camp. High-flow spout. BPA-free, food-grade polyethylene remains flexible even in cold temperatures. The REI 3.75-Gallon Folding Water Carrier is made to hold water; do not freeze or fill with dry ice or carbonated or fermented fluids. Keep away from heat and sharp objects.
short_description: Lightweight and collapsible for compact storage, the REI 3.75-Gallon Folding Water Carrier makes it easy to carry and keep water at your camp.
